channel.title: Proffession on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Proffession on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About Me
item.description: hi, I’m Peter de Croos. I’m a software engineer. I’ve worked at startups in the SF Bay area for the last 5 years and now I’m a freelancer. I look at every new project as something to learn. I started with backbonejs and moved on to nodejs. When I returned to frontend work, I built systems with angular and reactjs. These days, My development tools of choice are elixir and react/redux or turbolinks for the frontend.
